Message:
The two of us then
set out on a journey.

The “Witch of Murder”
has a bounty on her head.

As we ran away from city to city,
she turned my body to dust,
claiming she was conducting
experiments.

I had no clue what she was
doing while I was dead.

Whenever I was resurrected,
her grin would always
be there to greet me.

“Good morning.
Now, that’s a face that
creeps me out no matter
how many times I see it.”

“Thank you. Now then,
let me try killing you
one more time.”

I’ve gotten used to
these exchanges of ours.
As my life feels more and more
detached from my body,
even my sense of reality
begins slipping away.

That reminds me.
It should be about time
we leave this city.

Are we going to a southern city
famous for its cuisine next?
I wanna go to a hot spring
in the north too.

As I asked about
our next destination,
she no longer had
her usual grin.

Instead, she had a
gentle smile on her face.

“Our journey’s over.
It’s time for our wishes
to finally come true.”

Then, her body
started turning to dust.
